short_summary: Supply, delivery, installation, and training of a Computer Numeric Control (CNC) 3 Axis System Water Jet Cutting Machine
description: The Department of National Defence, 19 Wing Comox, 19 MSS, Royal Canadian Electrical and Mechanical Engineers (RCEME) Machine Shop has a requirement for the supply, delivery, installation, and training of a Computer Numeric Control (CNC) 3 Axis System Water Jet Cutting Machine with three (3) one (1) year optional software upgrades and on-site maintenance service, on-site preventive maintenance service, and technical support service periods.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Notification of Requirement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites contractors to submit proposals for the supply of a Computer Numeric Control (CNC) 3 Axis System Water Jet Cutting Machine.

### Bid Details

- **Bid Title**: W0133-23T009 – Waterjet Cutter
- **Reference Number**: WS3644169770-Doc3737854298
- **Reference Date**: Released on January 21, 2023
- **Bid Close Date**: March 15, 2023, at 14:00:00 hours

### Requirements

The contractor is required to:

- Supply, deliver, install, and train personnel on a CNC 3 Axis System Water Jet Cutting Machine with three (3) optional one (1) year software upgrades
- Provide on-site maintenance service, on-site preventive maintenance service, and technical support service

### Agreements

This tender is open to the following trade agreements:

- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- ... and more

### Regions of Delivery

Deliveries will be made to the Department of National Defence (DND) at 19 Wing Comox.

### Contact Information

- **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5 Canada
- **Contact Person**: Thorne, Darlene (SPAC/PSPC), telephone: None, email: <darlene.thorne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>, <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15189926?extsite=MTUxODk5MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Website Notice
For more information, please refer to the website link: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15189926?extsite=MTUxODk5MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
